# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-vim-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/vimadapter-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/vimadapter-deployment-1.1.0-20161031.133226-5.zip" && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-vim-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-vim-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8481
RUN echo Open-O nfvo-driver-vim 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/nfvo/vimadapter-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/vimadapter-deployment-1.1.0-20161031.133226-5.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
